bookText.htmlContent: Saiyans are mysterious in nature. Saiyans suddenly appeared after a series of meteor shower that crashed on the plains.

Saiyans are powerful creatures, a step above every others in the matter of manipulation of the arcane essences, which saiyans can turn into "KI". Said KI is what allows saiyans to fly without physical pre-requisites but aslo channel it into unbelievably strong energetic attacks. Those attacks are rumored to be used to destroy and/or conquer planets. We can only hope that it is rumors.
